
There was a version for AmigaOS in 1997 or 1998 by Fred Fish,
a developer notable for work on the GNU Debugger,
and his series of Fish disks of freeware for the Amiga.

That was for AmigaOS m68k.

The compiler still works on AmigaOS for those interested:
http://www.efeelin.com/2019/04/construire-le-compilateur-portable.html

The latter is for AmigaOS 4 on PowerPC.
